content:
哈利·波特与死亡圣器 ✣ p. I
— 游牧民族。

“Shameful thoughts visit me before sleep. There’s no way I’m saying it out loud but… I’m scared, Harry. What if we don’t make it in time? What if the world falls apart before we barely touch the Truth? You won’t ever see Ginny. I won’t meet my parents. And Ron. We won’t find out where the Key is hidden. And after long years of recovering, some other reckless guys will raise their heads. Just like we once did. They’ll seek for answers and believe in the Right Thing. May they succeed.
But for now, we’ve got enough strength to move on. Let’s have a good sleep and wake up to a brand new day that we can change.
We still can, can’t we, Harry?”
